question: Who is the first super heavyweight (+91kg) Indian boxer to qualify for the Olympic Games?
explanation:
Veteran Indian boxer Satish Kumar recently became the first super heavyweight (+91kg) Indian boxer to qualify for the Olympic Games.
Satish Kumar is a bronze-medallist in 2014 Asian Games, silver medallist in 2018 Commonwealth Games and a two-time bronze-winner at the Asian Championships -2015 and 2019. Other Indian boxers Amit Panghal and Manish Kaushik also qualified for the Tokyo Olympics in 52kg and 63kg respectively.
